alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:25PM CDT until July 02 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LA CROSSE...NORTHWESTERN VERNON AND SOUTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coon Valley, or 12 miles northwest of Viroqua, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Westby around 235 PM CDT. Cashton around 240 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mount La Crosse, County Roads G And H, Brinkman Ridge, Jersey Valley County Park, St Marys, Portland and Esofea. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
